snippet.title: APICO Coming to Xbox
snippet.description:
APICO is a laid-back beekeeping sim game about breeding, collecting, & conserving bees! Set in a series of lush environments, APICO uniquely combines resource gathering, biology, and beekeeping minigames, taking ideas from a mix of real-life and fantasy apiculture & floriculture.

Plus, the 2.0 update, I Can't Bee-lieve it's Not Butter(flies)! introduces a kaleidoscope of new features to discover! Meet new friends, discover new pollinators, and relax to the new Bee-sides music tracks.

Your APICO Islands adventure makes its way to Xbox soon!

Plus, the 2.0 update, I Can't Bee-lieve it's Not Butter(flies)! introduces a kaleidoscope of new features to discover! Meet new friends, discover new pollinators, and relax to the new Bee-sides music tracks.
